revised_title: A Study on the Germination and Development of Isoetes lacustris, Linn.
tldr: The author investigates the germination and development of Isoetes lacustris, focusing on the germination of the macrospore. They describe the structure and stages of the spore's development, including cell division and the formation of the prothallium. The study provides valuable insights into the reproductive process of this unique plant species.
